name: Firelight Tsuchinoko
text: You can Ritual Summon this card with a "Firelight" card. You can only use each of the following effects of "Firelight Tsuchinoko" once per turn. If this card is Special Summoned: Inflict 500 damage to your opponent for each "Firelight" card you control with a different name. If this card is destroyed by a card effect: You can destroy 1 card on each player's field.
pendulum_text: During your Main Phase: You can Ritual Summon 1 Level 4 "Firelight" monster from your hand or face-up Extra Deck, then destroy this card. You cannot Pendulum Summon monsters, except "Firelight" monsters. This effect cannot be negated.
